CollectionMetadatum.description: Bartleby's Core: Collection Metadatum. Complete implementation in CollectionMetadatum

proxy.description: The proxy object (not serializable, not supervisable)

startTime.description: The start time of the progression state

informations.description: The consolidated information (may include the message)

category.description: A category to discriminate bunch of progression states
A category to discriminate bunch of completion states

RegistryMetadata.description: Bartleby's Core: Complete implementation in JRegistryMetadata. All its properties are not supervisable.

spaceUID.description: The data space UID can be shared between multiple registries.

schema.description: The user currently associated to the local instance of the registry

identificationMethod.description: The identification method (By cookie or by Key - kvid)

identificationValue.description: The current kvid identification value (injected in HTTP headers)

collaborationServerURL.description: The url of the collaboration server

stateDictionary.description: The State dictionary to insure registry persistency

URLBookmarkData.description: The collection of serialized Security-Scoped Bookmarks (you should store Data)

preferredFileName.description: The preferred filename for this registry/document

items.description: used for Core Debug , stores all the indexes by order of reception.
A collection of trigger Indexes (used to detect data holes)
The persistentcollection of triggers indexes owned by the current user (allows local distinctive analytics even on cloned documents)

lastIntegratedTriggerIndex.description: The index of the last trigger that has been integrated

items.description: A collection Triggers that are temporarly stored before data integration
A collection of PushOperations in Quarantine (check DataSynchronization.md "Faults" section for details)

bunchInProgress.description: Do we have operations in progress in the current bunch ?

totalNumberOfOperations.description: The highest number that we may have counted

schema.description: The consolidated progression state of all pending operations

pushOnChanges.description: If set to true any object creation, update, or deletion will be pushed as soon as possible.

User.description: Bartleby's Core: a user in a specified data Space

spaceUID.description: The spaceUID. A user with the same credentials can exists within multiple Data space.

email.description: The user's email. Can be the secondary Identification source

phoneNumber.description: The user's phone number. Can be the secondary Identification source

password.description: The hashed version of the user password

items.description: The user Tags. External reference to Tags instances

loginHasSucceed.description: set to true on the first successfull login in the session (this property is not serialized)

subjectUID.description: The subject UID you want to lock

userUID.description: The userUID that can unlock the locker

code.description: This code should be crypted / decrypted

startDate.definition: the starting date. If Locker.verifyed.online The server date will be used as reference

endDate.definition: the ending date. If Locker.verifyed.online The server date will be used as reference

gems.description: Thoses data gems will be return on success

ExternalReference.description: Bartleby's Core: an ExternalReference stores all the necessary data to find a unique resource.

iUID.description: The UID of the referred instance

iTypeName.description: The typeName of the referred instance

PushOperation.description: Bartleby's Core: an object used to provision serialized operation. All its properties are not supervisable

commandUID.description: The unique identifier of the related Command

toDictionary.description: The dictionary representation of a serialized action call

responseDictionary.description: The dictionary representation of the last response serialized data

schema.description: The completion state of the operation

status.description: The invocation Status None: on creation, Pending: can be pushed, Provisionned: is currently in an operation bunch, InProgress: the endpoint has been called, Completed : The end point call has been completed

Trigger.description: Bartleby's Core: a Trigger encapsulates a bunch of ExternalReferencees that's modelizes a state transformation

index.description: The index is injected server side (each dataspace-registry) has it own counter)

observationUID.description: The observation UID for a given document correspond  to the Registry.rootObjectUID

runUID.description: The UID of the instance of Bartleby client that has created the trigger.

origin.description: The action that has initiated the trigger

creationDate.description: The server side creation date ( informative, use index for ranking)

Tag.description: Bartleby's Core: a tag can be used to classify instances.

parameters.name: collectionMetadatumId
parameters.description: The unique identifier the the of CollectionMetadatum

post.summary: Creates a new CollectionMetadatum to the system

parameters.name: collectionMetadatum
parameters.description: The instance ofCollectionMetadatum that needs to be added

parameters.name: collectionMetadatumId
parameters.description: The identifier of the CollectionMetadatum to be deleted

post.summary: Create collectionMetadata to the system

parameters.name: collectionMetadata
parameters.description: Collection of CollectionMetadatum that needs to be added

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The IDS of the collectionMetadata to return

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The ids of collectionMetadata to delete

get.summary: Find collectionMetadata by query (check $q, $s, $f in Bartleby's MongoCallDataRawWrapper)
